about_the_game:
Get into the aerocycle and let's go!


ITRP _ Aero Star offers you to overcome an obstacle course.
Push your skills to the limit on an unpredictable track. Each stage is unique.
Somewhere you need to demonstrate mastery of reaction. Somewhere spatial thinking. Somewhere discretion.
Don't be afraid to make mistakes. Fear what follows. The track is dangerous and treacherous, but fair – any mistakes will be forgiven if you prove your superiority to it.



You are a volunteer who has agreed to take part in special research.
It is extremely important that the test be as painless as possible, so carefully prepare for the race.
You have been provided with everything you need to be fully armed, and your personal supervisor will carefully monitor your development.
The test will be completed successfully if you get to the very end of the track, overcoming all its challenges.

Features:

  • Scripted track. Low level of the randomness factor.
  • Constantly changing mechanics that force you to adapt to new conditions.
  • All segments are unique and do not repeat throughout the game.
  • It will take no more than an hour to get from the beginning to the end of the track.
  • Checkpoints save and update progress.
  • Progression system based on the reduction of previously received damage.
  • Several endings, depending on the exact way the track was overcome.
  • Training mode that allows you to configure the track in detail.
  • A challenge worthy of a true hardcore racing fan!

highlighted.name: God of Random has heard my prayers
The army of midgets is useless even when accelerating

name: ITRP _ Aero Star

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 850M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 1024 X 768

short_description: Dynamic and hardcore runner. Dare to overcome a unpredictable track with a lot of unique challenges. Can you reach the finish line? Can you survive?
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Ukrainian
